item.title: Avatar: The Legend of Korra
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Soulcist:

I feel like in some instances it has some better parts than the first show but meh… at the moment, it’s going quite slow. I’m a little worried about them not making another season after this because of Nickelodeon only airing it on their website now.

It’s been slow since the second season…

I hate how static they’ve made Team Avatar, and especially how weak and pathetic they are. The only time they ever excel at fighting is when it’s against the good guys; generally police lmao. If Korra was taught by the White Lotus and other extremely powerful and talented benders, why has she been getting her ass beat every season? It’s horribly depressing how badly borked they made her compared to Aang. Even using a defensive stance Aang wrecked wayyyy more havoc than an avatar who was using 3/4 elements by the age of ~3. She was given instructions on how to pretty much perfectly bend each element, passed all the tests and we even see with the fire test she destroyed WHITE LOTUS MEMBERS. I mean honestly, they put her through such rigorous training because they needed her to be able to fight off team Anti-Avatar if they were to ever escape.

However, I am going to take this weekend and watch all of the episodes. I’m hoping you all are right about the fourth season being so good, because honestly I wouldn’t want them to make another avatar show if it’s going to be like this.

Oh and I thought this was an excellent AMV for Avatar. Too bad it encompasses every single moment Korra did something cool and is that short.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EwGe1ziyuOw[/youtube]
